case_circumstances: Jane Doe #05-70 was found as fragmented skeletal remains scattered on the surface near a shallow grave at a mining claim near the desert city of Twenty-Nine Palms on 12/28/70.  Evidence suggests that she may have been buried. She is described as a White female, 5'2"  to 5' 3"¬ù tall, with long Red/Auburn hair. Her age is estimated between 15-35 years. She wore a plastic partial upper denture.
